13877330Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic virtual bool CallValidation(string ruleSet)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Errors = new List<ValidationFailure>();Di2015NewLine            ValidatorAttribute val = this.GetType().GetCustomAttributes(typeof(ValidatorAttribute), true)[0] as ValidatorAttribute;Di2015NewLine            IValidator validator = Activator.CreateInstance(val.ValidatorType) as IValidator;Di2015NewLine            FluentValidation.Results.ValidationResult result = validator.Validate(new FluentValidation.ValidationContext(this, new PropertyChain(), new RulesetValidatorSelector(ruleSet)));Di2015NewLine            FluentValidation.Results.ValidationResult resultCommon = validator.Validate(this);Di2015NewLine            IsValid = (result.IsValid || resultCommon.IsValid);Di2015NewLine            Errors = result.Errors.Union(resultCommon.Errors).ToList();Di2015NewLine            return IsValid;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13881950Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string[] GetSplitStrings(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IList<string> splitStrings = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    var counter = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    var inLessGreater = false; // sometimes <> can contain "Di2015NewLine    foreach (var character in input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    if (character.Equals('<'))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        inLessGreater = true;Di2015NewLine        counter++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (character.Equals('>'))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        inLessGreater = false;Di2015NewLine        counter++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (character.Equals('"') && !inLessGreater)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        counter++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ((character.Equals(' ') && counter == 0) || (counter == 2))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (sb.ToString().Equals("") == false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        if (character.Equals('"') || character.Equals('>'))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(character);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        splitStrings.Add(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sb.Clear();Di2015NewLine        counter = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(character);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return splitStrings.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13886096Di2015UniqueSeparatornextAvailableTime = Times.FirstOrDefault(p => {Di2015NewLine    // Check count first, get this out of the way.Di2015NewLine    if (!(p.Count < ConcurrentAppointments)) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The date time and the date componentDi2015NewLine    DateTime dt = p.Time;Di2015NewLine    DateTime d = dt.Date;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The windowsDi2015NewLine    DateTime prevWindowMin = d.AddDays(-1) + minTime;Di2015NewLine    DateTime prevWindowMax = d.AddDays(-1) + maxTime;Di2015NewLine    DateTime windowMin = d + minTime;Di2015NewLine    DateTime windowMax = d + maxTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Is it in *either* window;Di2015NewLine    returnDi2015NewLine        (prevWindowMin <= dt && dt <= prevWindowMax)||Di2015NewLine        (windowMin <= dt && dt <= windowMax);Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLine

13897707Di2015UniqueSeparator%(?<name>[^%]+)%

13897707Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace renamerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class RenameImplDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<Tuple<string,string>> RenameWithPatterns(Di2015NewLine            string path, string curpattern, string newpattern,Di2015NewLine            bool caseSensitive)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var placeholderNames = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Extract all the cur_placeholders from the user's input patternDi2015NewLine            var input_regex = new Regex(@"(\\%[^%]+\\%)");Di2015NewLine            var cur_matches = input_regex.Matches(curpattern);Di2015NewLine            var new_matches = input_regex.Matches(newpattern);Di2015NewLine            var regex_pattern = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!caseSensitive)Di2015NewLine                regex_pattern.Append("(?i)");Di2015NewLine            regex_pattern.Append('^');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Do a pass over the matches and grab info about each captureDi2015NewLine            var cur_placeholders = new List<Tuple<string, int, int>>();Di2015NewLine            var new_placeholders = new List<Tuple<string, int, int>>();Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < cur_matches.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var m = cur_matches[i];Di2015NewLine                cur_placeholders.Add(new Tuple<string, int, int>(Di2015NewLine                    m.Value, m.Index, m.Length));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < new_matches.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var m = new_matches[i];Di2015NewLine                new_placeholders.Add(new Tuple<string, int, int>(Di2015NewLine                    m.Value, m.Index, m.Length));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Build the regular expressionDi2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < cur_placeholders.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var ph = cur_placeholders[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Get the literal before the first capture if it is the firstDi2015NewLine                if (i == 0 && ph.Item2 > 0)Di2015NewLine                    regex_pattern.Append(Regex.Escape(Di2015NewLine                        curpattern.Substring(0, ph.Item2)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Generate the capture for the placeholderDi2015NewLine                regex_pattern.AppendFormat("(?<{0}>.*?)",Di2015NewLine                    ph.Item1.Replace("%", ""));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // The literal after the placeholderDi2015NewLine                if (i + 1 == cur_placeholders.Count)Di2015NewLine                    regex_pattern.Append(Regex.Escape(Di2015NewLine                        curpattern.Substring(ph.Item2 + ph.Item3)));Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    regex_pattern.Append(Regex.Escape(Di2015NewLine                        curpattern.Substring(ph.Item2 + ph.Item3,Di2015NewLine                        cur_placeholders[i + 1].Item2 - (ph.Item2 + ph.Item3))));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            regex_pattern.Append('$');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var re = new Regex(regex_pattern.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var pathname in Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries(path))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var file = Path.GetFileName(pathname);Di2015NewLine                var m = re.Match(file);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!m.Success)Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // New name is initially same as target pattern Di2015NewLine                var newname = newpattern;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Iterate through the placeholder namesDi2015NewLine                for (var i = new_placeholders.Count; i > 0; --i)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Target placeholder nameDi2015NewLine                    var tn = new_placeholders[i-1].Item1.Replace("%", "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Get captured value for this captureDi2015NewLine                    var ct = m.Groups[tn].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Perform the replacementDi2015NewLine                    newname = newname.Remove(new_placeholders[i - 1].Item2,Di2015NewLine                        new_placeholders[i - 1].Item3);Di2015NewLine                    newname = newname.Insert(new_placeholders[i - 1].Item2, ct);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                newname = Path.Combine(path, newname);Di2015NewLine                yield return new Tuple<string, string>(pathname, newname);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13916920Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class StringExtDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string InsertAfterEvery(Di2015NewLine        this string source, string insert, int every, string find)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int numberFound = 0;Di2015NewLine        int index = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (index < source.Length && index > -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            index = source.IndexOf(find, index) + find.Length;Di2015NewLine            numberFound++;Di2015NewLine            if (numberFound % every == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                source = source.Insert(index, insert);Di2015NewLine                index += insert.Length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return source;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// I used 3 rather than 15Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine    "db 4Dh, 5Ah, 80h, 00h, 01h, 00h, 00h, 00h, 04h,".InsertAfterEvery(Di2015NewLine        Environment.NewLine, 3, ","));Di2015NewLine

13923031Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static class InputEventArgsExtensionsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static Point GetPosition<T>(this T e, IInputElement obj)Di2015NewLine            where T : InputEventArgsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (e is MouseEventArgs)Di2015NewLine                return (e as MouseEventArgs).GetPosition(obj);Di2015NewLine            else if (e is TouchEventArgs)Di2015NewLine                return (e as TouchEventArgs).GetTouchPoint(obj).Position;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new Point();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
13923124Di2015UniqueSeparator=============    (width 13 pixels = 13 bytes when using RGB)Di2015NewLine================ (stride would be 16)Di2015NewLine
13923124Di2015UniqueSeparator==============   (width 14 pixels = 14 bytes when using RGB)Di2015NewLine================ (stride would still be 16)Di2015NewLine
13923124Di2015UniqueSeparatorDim rect As New Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height)Di2015NewLineDim bmpData As System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData = bmp.LockBits(rect, Imaging.ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, Imaging.PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)Di2015NewLineDim ptr As IntPtr = bmpData.Scan0Di2015NewLineDim cols As New List(Of Color)Di2015NewLineDim bytes As Integer = Math.Abs(bmpData.Stride) * bmp.HeightDi2015NewLineDim rgbValues(bytes - 1) As ByteDi2015NewLineSystem.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(ptr, rgbValues, 0, bytes)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDim x, y, dx, l as IntegerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFor y = 0 To rect.Height - 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    l = y * bmpData.Stride 'calulate line based on strideDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    For x = 0 To rect.Width - 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dx = l + x * 3  '3 for RGB, 4 for ARGB, notice l is used as offsetDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cols.Add(Color.FromArgb(rgbValues(dx + 2), _Di2015NewLine                                rgbValues(dx + 1), _Di2015NewLine                                rgbValues(dx)))Di2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLineNextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Retrieve RGB valuesDi2015NewLine'For i = modByte To rgbValues.Length Step 3Di2015NewLine'     cols.Add(Color.FromArgb(rgbValues(i + 2), rgbValues(i + 1), rgbValues(i)))Di2015NewLine'NextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebmp.UnlockBits(bmpData)Di2015NewLinebmp.Dispose()Di2015NewLine

13926304Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<string> Load(string tableName, string columnName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> result = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var cn = new SqlConnection(@"Data Source=Nick-PC\\SQLEXPRESS;Initial Catalog=AutoDB;Integrated Security=True"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cn.Open();Di2015NewLine            using (var cmd = new SqlCommand("SELECT * FROM " + tableName, cn))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (var reader = cmd.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        result.Add(reader[columnName].ToString());Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13926781Di2015UniqueSeparator--Declare variables to hold date values Di2015NewLineDECLARE @MyDate    DATETIME, Di2015NewLine        @FirstDate DATETIME, Di2015NewLine        @LastDate  DATETIME Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT @MyDate = Getdate() -- OR Pass whatever date you want Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine--Populate variable with values of first date and last date of the given month Di2015NewLineSELECT @FirstDate = CONVERT(VARCHAR(25), Dateadd(dd, -( Day(@mydate) - 1 ), Di2015NewLine                                         @mydate), Di2015NewLine                           101), Di2015NewLine       @LastDate = CONVERT(VARCHAR(25), Dateadd(dd, -( Day( Di2015NewLine                                        Dateadd(mm, 1, @mydate)) ), Di2015NewLine                                                    Dateadd(mm, 1, @mydate)), Di2015NewLine                   101) Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine--Declare table variable to hold date values for the entire month Di2015NewLineDECLARE @AllDates TABLE Di2015NewLine  ( Di2015NewLine     datevalue DATETIME Di2015NewLine  ) Di2015NewLineDECLARE @Lastday INT Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @Lastday = Datepart(d, @LastDate) Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDECLARE @Days INT Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @Days = 1 Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Populate table variable with all days of the month Di2015NewLineWHILE @Days <= @Lastday Di2015NewLine  BEGIN Di2015NewLine      INSERT INTO @AllDates Di2015NewLine      SELECT @FirstDate Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      SET @FirstDate = Dateadd(d, 1, @FirstDate) Di2015NewLine      SET @Days = @Days + 1 Di2015NewLine  END Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine--Query joining the EmpLog table and Holiday Table, using Left Outer Join  Di2015NewLineSELECT AD.datevalue Di2015NewLineFROM   @AllDates AD Di2015NewLine       LEFT OUTER JOIN emplog EL Di2015NewLine                    ON AD.datevalue = EL.datevalue Di2015NewLine       LEFT OUTER JOIN holiday H Di2015NewLine                    ON AD.datevalue = H.datevalue Di2015NewLine-- Where clause to return only dates that do not appear in EmpLog or Holiday tables Di2015NewLineWHERE  EL.datevalue IS NULL Di2015NewLine       AND H.datevalue IS NULL  Di2015NewLine

13929169Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// XML serializer helper class. Serializes and deserializes objects from/to XMLDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T">The type of the object to serialize/deserialize.Di2015NewLine/// Must have a parameterless constructor and implement <see cref="Serializable"/></typeparam>Di2015NewLinepublic class XmlSerializer<T> where T: class, new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Deserializes a XML file.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="filename">The filename of the XML file to deserialize</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>An object of type <c>T</c></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static T DeserializeFromFile(string filename)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return DeserializeFromFile(filename, new XmlReaderSettings());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Deserializes a XML file.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="filename">The filename of the XML file to deserialize</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="settings">XML serialization settings. <see cref="System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings"/></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>An object of type <c>T</c></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static T DeserializeFromFile(string filename, XmlReaderSettings settings)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(filename))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("filename", "XML filename cannot be null or empty");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (! File.Exists(filename))Di2015NewLine            throw new FileNotFoundException("Cannot find XML file to deserialize", filename);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create the stream writer with the specified encodingDi2015NewLine        using (XmlReader reader = XmlReader.Create(filename, settings))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer xmlSerializer = new System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine            return (T) xmlSerializer.Deserialize(reader);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

13931657Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing (TransactionScope transactionScope = new TransactionScope())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    XmlDocument configFile = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    configFile.Load("PathToConfigFile");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    XPathNavigator fileNavigator = configFile.CreateNavigator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // User recursive function to get to the correct node and set the valueDi2015NewLine    WriteValueToConfigFile(fileNavigator, pathToValue, newValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    configFile.Save("PathToConfigFile");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Commit transactionDi2015NewLine    transactionScope.Complete();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void WriteValueToConfigFile(XPathNavigator fileNavigator, string remainingPath, string newValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] splittedXPath = remainingPath.Split(new[] { '/' }, 2);Di2015NewLine    if (splittedXPath.Length == 0 || String.IsNullOrEmpty(remainingPath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Path incorrect.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string xPathPart = splittedXPath[0];Di2015NewLine    XPathNavigator nodeNavigator = fileNavigator.SelectSingleNode(xPathPart);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (splittedXPath.Length > 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // RecursionDi2015NewLine        WriteValueToConfigFile(nodeNavigator, splittedXPath[1], newValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        nodeNavigator.SetValue(newValue ?? 13932973Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.ObjectModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Specialized;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ViewLayerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class TransformObservableCollection<T,Source> : INotifyCollectionChanged, IList, IReadOnlyList<T>, IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public TransformObservableCollection(ObservableCollection<Source> wrappedCollection, Func<Source,T> transform)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_WrappedCollection = wrappedCollection;Di2015NewLine            m_TransformFunc = transform;Di2015NewLine            ((INotifyCollectionChanged)m_WrappedCollection).CollectionChanged += TransformObservableCollection_CollectionChanged;Di2015NewLine            m_TransformedCollection = new ObservableCollection<T>(m_WrappedCollection.Select(m_TransformFunc));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m_WrappedCollection == null) return;Di2015NewLine            ((INotifyCollectionChanged)m_WrappedCollection).CollectionChanged -= TransformObservableCollection_CollectionChanged;Di2015NewLine            m_WrappedCollection = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        void TransformObservableCollection_CollectionChanged(object sender, NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (e.Action)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add:Di2015NewLine                    if (e.NewItems == null || e.NewItems.Count != 1)Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    m_TransformedCollection.Insert(e.NewStartingIndex,m_TransformFunc((Source)e.NewItems[0]));Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move:Di2015NewLine                    if (e.NewItems == null || e.NewItems.Count != 1 || e.OldItems == null || e.OldItems.Count != 1)Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    m_TransformedCollection.Move(e.OldStartingIndex, e.NewStartingIndex);Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove:Di2015NewLine                    if (e.OldItems == null || e.OldItems.Count != 1)Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    m_TransformedCollection.RemoveAt(e.OldStartingIndex);Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace:Di2015NewLine                    if (e.NewItems == null || e.NewItems.Count != 1 || e.OldItems == null || e.OldItems.Count != 1 || e.OldStartingIndex != e.NewStartingIndex)Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    m_TransformedCollection[e.OldStartingIndex] = m_TransformFunc((Source)e.NewItems[0]);Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine            } // This  is most likely called on a Clear(), we don't optimize the other cases (yet)Di2015NewLine            m_TransformedCollection.Clear();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in m_WrappedCollection)Di2015NewLine                m_TransformedCollection.Add(m_TransformFunc(item));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region IList Edit functions that are unsupported because this collection is read onlyDi2015NewLine        public int Add(object value) { throw new InvalidOperationException(); }Di2015NewLine        public void Clear() { throw new InvalidOperationException(); }Di2015NewLine        public void Insert(int index, object value) { throw new InvalidOperationException(); }Di2015NewLine        public void Remove(object value) { throw new InvalidOperationException(); }Di2015NewLine        public void RemoveAt(int index) { throw new InvalidOperationException(); }Di2015NewLine        #endregion IList Edit functions that are unsupported because this collection is read onlyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region AccessorsDi2015NewLine        public T this[int index] { get { return m_TransformedCollection[index]; } }Di2015NewLine        object IList.this[int index] { get { return m_TransformedCollection[index]; } set { throw new InvalidOperationException(); } }Di2015NewLine        public bool Contains(T value) { return m_TransformedCollection.Contains(value); }Di2015NewLine        bool IList.Contains(object value) { return ((IList)m_TransformedCollection).Contains(value); }Di2015NewLine        public int IndexOf(T value) { return m_TransformedCollection.IndexOf(value); }Di2015NewLine        int IList.IndexOf(object value) { return ((IList)m_TransformedCollection).IndexOf(value); }Di2015NewLine        public int Count { get { return m_TransformedCollection.Count; } }Di2015NewLine        public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator() { return m_TransformedCollection.GetEnumerator(); }Di2015NewLine        IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() { return ((IEnumerable)m_TransformedCollection).GetEnumerator(); }Di2015NewLine        #endregion AccessorsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool IsFixedSize { get { return false; } }Di2015NewLine        public bool IsReadOnly { get { return true; } }Di2015NewLine        public void CopyTo(Array array, int index) { ((IList)m_TransformedCollection).CopyTo(array, index); }Di2015NewLine        public void CopyTo(T[] array, int index) { m_TransformedCollection.CopyTo(array, index); }Di2015NewLine        public bool IsSynchronized { get { return false; } }Di2015NewLine        public object SyncRoot { get { return m_TransformedCollection; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ObservableCollection<T> m_TransformedCollection;Di2015NewLine        ObservableCollection<Source> m_WrappedCollection;Di2015NewLine        Func<Source, T> m_TransformFunc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        event NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChangedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            add { ((INotifyCollectionChanged)m_TransformedCollection).CollectionChanged += value; }Di2015NewLine            remove { ((INotifyCollectionChanged)m_TransformedCollection).CollectionChanged -= value; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13934867Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static CultureInfo getCultureByEnglishName(String englishName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // create an array of CultureInfo to hold all the cultures found, Di2015NewLine    // these include the users local culture, and all theDi2015NewLine    // cultures installed with the .Net FrameworkDi2015NewLine    CultureInfo[] cultures = CultureInfo.GetCultures(CultureTypes.AllCultures & ~CultureTypes.NeutralCultures);Di2015NewLine    // get culture by it's english name Di2015NewLine    var culture = cultures.FirstOrDefault(c => Di2015NewLine        c.EnglishName.Equals(englishName, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase));Di2015NewLine    return culture;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13935579Di2015UniqueSeparator// code sample copied from blog post stated aboveDi2015NewLineTask.Factory.StartNew(() => Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    // #2 long-running work, so offloaded to non-UI thread Di2015NewLine}).ContinueWith(t => Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    // #3 back on the UI thread Di2015NewLine    Task.Factory.StartNew(() => Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        // #4 compute-intensive work we want offloaded to non-UI thread (bug!) Di2015NewLine    }); Di2015NewLine}, CancellationToken.None,Di2015NewLineTaskContinuationOptions.HideScheduler, // <-- new option stated in textDi2015NewLineTaskScheduler.FromCurrentSynchronizationContext()); Di2015NewLine

13935579Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var uiSched = TaskScheduler.FromCurrentSynchronizationContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    button1.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this HardWork-task is not blocking, as we haveDi2015NewLine    // TaskScheduler.Default as the default schedulerDi2015NewLine    Task.Factory.StartNew(HardWork)Di2015NewLine        .ContinueWith(t =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            button1.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // this HardWork-task will block, as we are on theDi2015NewLine            // UI thread schedulerDi2015NewLine            Task.Factory.StartNew(HardWork)Di2015NewLine                .ContinueWith(t2 =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    button1.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // this one will not, as we pass TaskScheduler.DefaultDi2015NewLine                    // explicitlyDi2015NewLine                    Task.Factory.StartNew(HardWork,Di2015NewLine                        new CancellationToken(),Di2015NewLine                        TaskCreationOptions.None,Di2015NewLine                        TaskScheduler.Default).ContinueWith(t3 =>Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            button1.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine                        }, uiSched);  // come back to UI thread to alter button1Di2015NewLine                }, uiSched); // come back to UI thread to alter button1Di2015NewLine        }, uiSched); // come back on UI thread to alter button1Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void HardWork()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    while(i < Int32.MaxValue) i++;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13937975Di2015UniqueSeparator[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic void Run_Action_as_IOb_on_scheduler_with_ObCreate()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var scheduler = new TestScheduler();Di2015NewLine    var flag = false;Di2015NewLine    Action action = () => { flag = true; };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var subscription = Observable.Create<Unit>(observer =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                action();Di2015NewLine                observer.OnNext(Unit.Default);Di2015NewLine                observer.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                observer.OnError(ex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return Disposable.Empty;Di2015NewLine        })Di2015NewLine        .SubscribeOn(scheduler)Di2015NewLine        .Subscribe();   //Without subscribe, the action wont run.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Assert.IsFalse(flag);Di2015NewLine    scheduler.AdvanceBy(1);Di2015NewLine    Assert.IsTrue(flag);Di2015NewLine    subscription.Dispose(); //Not required as the sequence will have completed and then auto-detached.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic void Run_Action_as_IOb_on_scheduler_with_ObCreate_dispose()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var scheduler = new TestScheduler();Di2015NewLine    var flag = false;Di2015NewLine    Action action = () => { flag = true; };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var subscription = Observable.Create<Unit>(observer =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            action();Di2015NewLine            observer.OnNext(Unit.Default);Di2015NewLine            observer.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            observer.OnError(ex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Disposable.Empty;Di2015NewLine    })Di2015NewLine        .SubscribeOn(scheduler)Di2015NewLine        .Subscribe();   //Without subscribe, the action wont run.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Assert.IsFalse(flag);Di2015NewLine    subscription.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    scheduler.AdvanceBy(1);Di2015NewLine    Assert.IsFalse(flag); Only at subscription the task will be executed. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="action">The action.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <example>Di2015NewLine    /// <code>Di2015NewLine    /// <![CDATA[Di2015NewLine    /// RxActionUtilities.MakeObservable_3(myAction)Di2015NewLine    ///                  .SubscribeOn(_schedulerProvider.TaskPoolScheduler)Di2015NewLine    ///                  .Subscribe(....);Di2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// ]]>Di2015NewLine    /// </code>Di2015NewLine    /// </example>Di2015NewLine    public static IObservable<Unit> MakeObservable_3(Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Observable.Create<Unit>(observer =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    action();Di2015NewLine                    observer.OnNext(Unit.Default);Di2015NewLine                    observer.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    observer.OnError(ex);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return Disposable.Empty;Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13937975Di2015UniqueSeparator[Test, Timeout(2000)]Di2015NewLinepublic void DispatcherFail()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var wasRun = false;Di2015NewLine    Action MyAction = () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Running...");Di2015NewLine            wasRun = true;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Run.");Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher.BeginInvoke(MyAction);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Assert.IsTrue(wasRun);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13937975Di2015UniqueSeparator[Test, Timeout(2000)]Di2015NewLinepublic void Testing_with_Dispatcher_BeginInvoke()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var frame = new DispatcherFrame();  //1 - The Message loopDi2015NewLine    var wasRun = false;Di2015NewLine    Action MyAction = () =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Running...");Di2015NewLine        wasRun = true;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Run.");Di2015NewLine        frame.Continue = false;         //2 - Stop the message loop, else we hang foreverDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher.BeginInvoke(MyAction);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dispatcher.PushFrame(frame);        //3 - Start the message loopDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Assert.IsTrue(wasRun);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13938401Di2015UniqueSeparator// The original type, unmodifiedDi2015NewLineclass Pair<T> {Di2015NewLine    public T First, Second;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Interface for any Action on a Pair<T>Di2015NewLineinterface IPairVisitor {Di2015NewLine    void Visit<T>(Pair<T> pair);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass PairSwapVisitor : IPairVisitor {Di2015NewLine    public void Visit<T>(Pair<T> pair) {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Pair<{0}>: ({1},{2})", typeof(T), pair.First, pair.Second);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// General interface for a container that follows the Visitor patternDi2015NewLineinterface IVisitableContainer<T> {Di2015NewLine    void Accept(T visitor);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The implementation of our Pair-ContainerDi2015NewLineclass VisitablePairList : IVisitableContainer<IPairVisitor> {Di2015NewLine    private List<Action<IPairVisitor>> m_visitables = new List<Action<IPairVisitor>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add<T>(Pair<T> pair) {Di2015NewLine        m_visitables.Add(visitor => visitor.Visit(pair));Di2015NewLine visitable(visitor);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class Application {Di2015NewLine    public static void Swap<T>(Pair<T> pair) {Di2015NewLine        T temp = pair.First;Di2015NewLine        pair.First = pair.Second;Di2015NewLine        pair.Second = temp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main() {Di2015NewLine        VisitablePairList list = new VisitablePairList();Di2015NewLine        list.Add(new Pair<int> { First = 1, Second = 2 });Di2015NewLine        list.Add(new Pair<string> { First = "first", Second = "second" });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        list.Accept(new PairSwapVisitor());Di2015NewLine        list.Accept(new PairPrintVisitor());Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

return items.ToSelectList( valueSelector, nameSelector, x => false );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///   Converts the source sequence into an "selectedItems">Those items that should be selected</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>IEnumerable of SelectListItem</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<SelectListItem> ToSelectList<TItem, TValue>( this IEnumerable<TItem> items, Func<TItem, TValue> valueSelector, Func<TItem, string> nameSelector, IEnumerable<TValue> selectedItems )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return items.ToSelectList( valueSelector, nameSelector, x => selectedItems != null && selectedItems.Contains( valueSelector( x ) ) );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ///            Value = value.ToString(),Di2015NewLine                        Selected = selectedValueSelector( item )Di2015NewLine                      };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

parent)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<IntPtr> result = new List<IntPtr>();Di2015NewLine    GCHandle listHandle = GCHandle.Alloc(result);Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine 13948059Di2015UniqueSeparatorBezierSegment
13948059Di2015UniqueSeparatorPolyLineSegment GetBezierApproximation(Point[] controlPoints, int outputSegmentCount)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Point[] points = new Point[outputSegmentCount + 1];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i <= outputSegmentCount; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double t = (double)i / outputSegmentCount;Di2015NewLine        points[i] = GetBezierPoint(t, controlPoints, 0, controlPoints.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return new PolyLineSegment(points, true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePoint GetBezierPoint(double t, Point[] controlPoints, int index, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (count == 1)Di2015NewLine        return controlPoints[index];Di2015NewLine    var P0 = GetBezierPoint(t, controlPoints, index, count - 1);Di2015NewLine    var P1 = GetBezierPoint(t, controlPoints, index + 1, count - 1);Di2015NewLine    return new Point((1 - t) * P0.X + t * P1.X, (1 - t) * P0.Y + t * P1.Y);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

0x0001;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePublic void resisezeWindow(String procesname, int Width, int Height, Boolean bringtofront)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (Process proc in 13959217Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static class ContextConnectionStringBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Modified Version of http://stackoverflow.com/a/2294308/209259Di2015NewLine  public static string GetEntityConnectionString(string ConnectionString, Di2015NewLine                                                 Type ContextType)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    string result = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string prefix = ContextType.NamespaceDi2015NewLine      .Replace(ContextType.Assembly.GetName().Name, "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (prefix.Length > 0Di2015NewLine        && prefix.StartsWith("."))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      prefix = prefix.Substring(1, prefix.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (prefix.Length > 1Di2015NewLine        && !prefix.EndsWith("."))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      prefix += ".";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    EntityConnectionStringBuilder csBuilder = Di2015NewLine      new EntityConnectionStringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    csBuilder.Provider = "System.Data.SqlClient";Di2015NewLine    csBuilder.ProviderConnectionString = ConnectionString.ToString();Di2015NewLine    csBuilder.Metadata = string.Format("res://{0}/{1}.csdl|"Di2015NewLine                                        + "res://{0}/{1}.ssdl|"Di2015NewLine                                        + "res://{0}/{1}.msl"Di2015NewLine                                        , ContextType.Assembly.FullNameDi2015NewLine                                        , prefix + ContextType.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    result =  csBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13962620Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using System;Di2015NewLine    using System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // This is the test string.Di2015NewLine            const string testString = "Test& <b>bold</b> <i>italic</i> <<Tag index=\\"0\\" />";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Do a regular expression search and replace. We're looking for a complete tag (which will be ignored) orDi2015NewLine            // a character that needs escaping.Di2015NewLine            string result = Regex.Replace(testString, @"(?'Tag'\\<{1}[^\\>\\<]*[\\>]{1})|(?'Ampy'\\&[A-Za-z0-9]+;)|(?'Special'[\\<\\>\\""\\'\\&])", (match) =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // If a special (escapable) character was found, replace it.Di2015NewLine                    if (match.Groups["Special"].Success)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        switch (match.Groups["Special"].Value)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            case "<":Di2015NewLine                                return "<";Di2015NewLine                            case ">":Di2015NewLine                                return ">";Di2015NewLine                            case "\\"":Di2015NewLine                                return """;Di2015NewLine                            case "\\'":Di2015NewLine                                return "'";Di2015NewLine                            case "&":Di2015NewLine                                return "&";Di2015NewLine                            default:Di2015NewLine                                return match.Groups["Special"].Value;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Otherwise, just return what was found.Di2015NewLine                    return match.Value;Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Show the result.Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Test String: " + testString);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Result     : " + result);Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13963739Di2015UniqueSeparator# the quotient function. Takes integers n and rDi2015NewLine# returns the number of times r goes into n, as an integerDi2015NewLinedef Q(n,r):Di2015NewLine    return n / rDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine# the remainder function. Takes integers n and rDi2015NewLine# returns the remainder when n is divided by r, as an integer Di2015NewLinedef R(n,r):Di2015NewLine    return n % rDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine# accepts an integer n, returns its representation in base r (r <= 10), as a stringDi2015NewLinedef radix(n,r):Di2015NewLine    nf = nDi2015NewLine    nrep = []Di2015NewLine    while nf > 0:Di2015NewLine        nr = R(nf,r)Di2015NewLine        nf = Q(nf,r)Di2015NewLine        nrep.append(str(nr))Di2015NewLine    return ''.join(nrep)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef base2(n):Di2015NewLine    return radix(n,2)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine# accepts a string representation of n, in base r (r <= 10)Di2015NewLine# returns the magnitude of nDi2015NewLinedef deradix(nrep,r):Di2015NewLine    power = 1Di2015NewLine    magnitude = 0Di2015NewLine    for unit in nrep:Di2015NewLine        term = power*int(unit)Di2015NewLine        magnitude += termDi2015NewLine        power *= rDi2015NewLine    return magnitudeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine # accepts a string representation of n in base 2, return the magnitude of n Di2015NewLinedef debase2(nrep):Di2015NewLine    return deradix(nrep,2)Di2015NewLine

13965912Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Composite Read(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    _errors = null;Di2015NewLine    var settings = new XmlReaderSettings();Di2015NewLine    using (var fileStream = File.OpenRead(XmlComponentsXsd))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var schemaReader = new XmlTextReader(fileStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            settings.Schemas.Add(null, schemaReader);Di2015NewLine            settings.ValidationType = ValidationType.Schema;Di2015NewLine            settings.ValidationEventHandler += OnValidationEventHandler;Di2015NewLine            using (var xmlReader = XmlReader.Create(stream, settings))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var serialiser = new XmlSerializer(typeof (Composite));Di2015NewLine                return (Composite) serialiser.Deserialize(xmlReader);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate ValidationEventArgs _errors = null;Di2015NewLineprivate void OnValidationEventHandler(object sender, ValidationEventArgs validationEventArgs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    _errors = validationEventArgs;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13965912Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool WriteXml(DirectoryInfo dir)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var xml = new XmlSerializer(typeof (Composite));Di2015NewLine    var filename = Path.Combine(dir.FullName, _composite.Symbol + ".xml");Di2015NewLine    // first write it to memoryDi2015NewLine    var memStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    xml.Serialize(memStream, _composite);Di2015NewLine    memStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine    Read(memStream);Di2015NewLine    if (_errors != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception(string.Format("Error writing to {0}. XSD validation failed : {1}", filename, _errors.Message));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    memStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine    using (var outFile = File.OpenWrite(filename))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        memStream.CopyTo(outFile);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    memStream.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13967995Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IConsoleWrapperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ConsoleKeyInfo ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    void Write(string data);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13967995Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string GetMaskedInput(string prompt, IConsoleWrapper console)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string pwd = "";Di2015NewLine        ConsoleKeyInfo key;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            key = console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine            if (key.Key != ConsoleKey.Backspace && key.Key != ConsoleKey.Enter)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pwd += key.KeyChar;Di2015NewLine                console.Write("*");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (key.Key == ConsoleKey.Backspace && pwd.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pwd = pwd.Substring(0, pwd.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine                    console.Write("\\b \\b");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (key.Key != ConsoleKey.Enter);Di2015NewLine        return pwd;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13968172Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression.AndAlso
13968172Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<T, bool>> AndAlso<T>(Di2015NewLine    this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1,Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // need to detect whether they use the sameDi2015NewLine    // parameter instance; if not, they need fixingDi2015NewLine    ParameterExpression param = expr1.Parameters[0];Di2015NewLine    if (ReferenceEquals(param, expr2.Parameters[0]))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // simple versionDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Di2015NewLine            Expression.AndAlso(expr1.Body, expr2.Body), param);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // otherwise, keep expr1 "as is" and invoke expr2Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Di2015NewLine        Expression.AndAlso(Di2015NewLine            expr1.Body,Di2015NewLine            Expression.Invoke(expr2, param)), param);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13976003Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc
13976003Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void RetryBeforeThrow<T>(Di2015NewLine    this Action action, Di2015NewLine    Func<T, int, bool> shouldThrow, Di2015NewLine    int waitTime) where T : ExceptionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (action == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("action");Di2015NewLine    if (shouldThrow == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("shouldThrow");Di2015NewLine    if (waitTime <= 0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Should be greater than zero.", "waitTime");Di2015NewLine    int tries = 0;Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            action();Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (T ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (shouldThrow(ex, ++tries))Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(waitTime);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    while (true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13976003Di2015UniqueSeparatorAction a = () => Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        //do stuff Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLinea.RetryBeforeThrow<Exception>((e, i) => i >= 5, 1000);Di2015NewLine

13976070Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool KickServices(string serviceUrl)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool result = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var request = WebRequest.Create(serviceUrl) as HttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLine            if (request != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                request.ContentType = "application/xml";Di2015NewLine                request.Method = "GET";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (request != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var response = request.GetResponse() as HttpWebResponse;Di2015NewLine                if (response != null && response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string resultContent = null;Di2015NewLine                    Encoding responseEncoding = Encoding.GetEncoding(response.CharacterSet);Di2015NewLine                    using (var sr = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream(), responseEncoding))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        resultContent = sr.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                        if (resultContent.Contains(serviceUrl))Di2015NewLine                            result = true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13981238Di2015UniqueSeparatorArray.Copy
13981238Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const int batchSize = 1048576;Di2015NewLineprivate static int[] GetDefaultSeriesArray2(int size, int value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int[] result = new int[size];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //fill the first batch normallyDi2015NewLine    int end = Math.Min(batchSize, size);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < end; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result[i] = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int numBatches = size / batchSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Parallel.For(1, numBatches, batch =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(result, 0, result, batch * batchSize, batchSize);Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //handle partial leftover batchDi2015NewLine    for (int i = numBatches * batchSize; i < size; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result[i] = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13984855Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static class MoveFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly IDictionary<String, Type> _moveTypes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static MoveFactory()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _moveTypes = LoadAllMoveTypes();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IDictionary<string, Type> LoadAllMoveTypes()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var asm =Di2015NewLine            //Get all types in the current assemblyDi2015NewLine            from type in Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetTypes()Di2015NewLine            //Where the type is a class and implements "IMove"Di2015NewLine            where type.IsClass && type.GetInterface("IMove") != nullDi2015NewLine            //Only select types that are decorated with our custom attributeDi2015NewLine            let attr = type.GetCustomAttribute<MoveNameAttribute>()Di2015NewLine            where attr != nullDi2015NewLine            //Return both the Name and the System.TypeDi2015NewLine            select newDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            name = attr.Name,Di2015NewLine                            typeDi2015NewLine                        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Convert the results to a Dictionary with the Name as a keyDi2015NewLine        // and the Type as the valueDi2015NewLine        return asm.ToDictionary(move => move.name, move => move.type);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static IMove CreateMove(String name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type moveType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Check to see if we have an IMove with the specific keyDi2015NewLine        if(_moveTypes.TryGetValue(name, out moveType))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Use reflection to create a new instance of that IMoveDi2015NewLine            return (IMove) Activator.CreateInstance(moveType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine           String.Format("Unable to locate move named: {0}", name));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13985867Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar sourcePath = @"C:\\data.csv";Di2015NewLinevar delimiter = ",";Di2015NewLinevar firstLineContainsHeaders = true;Di2015NewLinevar tempPath = Path.GetTempFileName();Di2015NewLinevar lineNumber = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar splitExpression = new Regex(@"(" + delimiter + @")(?=(?:[^""]|""[^""]*"")*$)");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (var writer = new StreamWriter(tempPath))Di2015NewLineusing (var reader = new StreamReader(sourcePath))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string line = null;Di2015NewLine    string[] headers = null;Di2015NewLine    if (firstLineContainsHeaders)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        line = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        lineNumber++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(line)) return; // file is empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        headers = splitExpression.Split(line).Where(s => s != delimiter).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine(line); // write the original header to the temp file.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while ((line = reader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lineNumber++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var columns = splitExpression.Split(line).Where(s => s != delimiter).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if there are no headers, do a simple sanity check to make sure you always have the same number of columns in a lineDi2015NewLine        if (headers == null) headers = new string[columns.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (columns.Length != headers.Length) throw new InvalidOperationException(string.Format("Line {0} is missing one or more columns.", lineNumber));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // TODO: search and replace in columnsDi2015NewLine        // example: replace 'v' in the first column with '\\/': if (columns[0].Contains("v")) columns[0] = columns[0].Replace("v", @"\\/");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine(string.Join(delimiter, columns));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFile.Delete(sourcePath);Di2015NewLineFile.Move(tempPath, sourcePath);Di2015NewLine

13986647Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat rotation = 0,Di2015NewLine    rotationSpeed = 0.002f, // this is how much rotation will change each frameDi2015NewLine    maximumAngle = 0.1f,Di2015NewLine    minimumAngle = -0.1f,Di2015NewLine    rotationDirection = 1,Di2015NewLine    scale = 1f, // 1 means 100%, 0.95f = 95%Di2015NewLine    scaleChange = 0.005f, // this may seem not much, but it's enoughDi2015NewLine    maxScale = 1.1f,Di2015NewLine    minScale = 0.9f,Di2015NewLine    scaleDirection = 1;Di2015NewLine
13986647Di2015UniqueSeparatorDrawLogo();
13986647Di2015UniqueSeparatorDraw()
13986647Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid DrawLogo()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // these two very similar pieces of code will control scale and rotationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (rotationDirection > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (rotation < maximumAngle)Di2015NewLine            rotation += rotationSpeed;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            rotationDirection = -rotationDirection;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        if (rotation > minimumAngle)Di2015NewLine            rotation -= rotationSpeed;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            rotationDirection = -rotationDirection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (scaleDirection > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (scale < maxScale)Di2015NewLine            scale += scaleChange;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            scaleDirection = -scaleDirection;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        if (scale > minScale)Di2015NewLine            scale -= scaleChange;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            scaleDirection = -scaleDirection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Texture2d t2d = logoTexture;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    spriteBatch.Draw(t2d,Di2015NewLine        centerScreen,            // change this to `new Vector2(123, 456)`Di2015NewLine        null,                    // null means draw entire textureDi2015NewLine        Color.White,             // no tintingDi2015NewLine        rotation,                // the rotation we calculate aboveDi2015NewLine        new Vector2(t2d.Width / 2, t2d.Height / 2),Di2015NewLine          // this sets rotation point to the center of the textureDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        scale,                   // the scale we calculate aboveDi2015NewLine        SpriteEffects.None,      // you can mirror your texture with thisDi2015NewLine        0);                      // I usually leave it zero :pDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13987596Di2015UniqueSeparator    static byte[] DecryptBytesToBytes (byte[] cipherText, byte[] Key, byte[] IV)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Check arguments. Di2015NewLine        if (cipherText == null || cipherText.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("cipherText");Di2015NewLine        if (Key == null || Key.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("Key");Di2015NewLine        if (IV == null || IV.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("Key");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Declare the string used to hold Di2015NewLine        // the decrypted text.Di2015NewLine        byte[] encrypted = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create an AesCryptoServiceProvider object Di2015NewLine        // with the specified key and IV. Di2015NewLine        using (AesCryptoServiceProvider aesAlg = new AesCryptoServiceProvider())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            aesAlg.Key = Key;Di2015NewLine            aesAlg.IV = IV;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create a decrytor to perform the stream transform.Di2015NewLine            ICryptoTransform decryptor = aesAlg.CreateDecryptor(aesAlg.Key, aesAlg.IV);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create the streams used for decryption. Di2015NewLine            using (MemoryStream msDecrypt = new MemoryStream(cipherText))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (CryptoStream csDecrypt = new CryptoStream(msDecrypt, decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (StreamReader srDecrypt = new StreamReader(csDecrypt))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        string encrypted_text = srDecrypt.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                        encrypted = new byte[encrypted_text.Length * sizeof(char)];Di2015NewLine                        System.Buffer.BlockCopy(encrypted_text.ToCharArray(), 0, encrypted, 0, encrypted.Length);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return encrypted;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13990369Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void HandleRefreshOrders()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (IsBusy)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IsBusy = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var task = Task.Factory.StartNew(() => RefreshOrders());Di2015NewLine    task.ContinueWith(t => Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                RefreshOrdersCompleted(t.Result);Di2015NewLine                IsBusy = false;Di2015NewLine            }, Di2015NewLine        CancellationToken.None, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnRanToCompletion,  TaskScheduler.FromCurrentSynchronizationContext());Di2015NewLine    task.ContinueWith(t => Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.LogAggregateException(t.Exception, Resources.OrdersEditorVM_OrdersLoading, Resources.OrdersEditorVM_OrdersLoadingFaulted);Di2015NewLine                IsBusy = false;Di2015NewLine            },Di2015NewLine    CancellationToken.None, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnFaulted, TaskScheduler.FromCurrentSynchronizationContext());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13990376Di2015UniqueSeparatorDim ResponseStream As Stream = Response.GetResponseStream()Di2015NewLine            TryDi2015NewLine                Dim reader As New StreamReader(Stream.Null)Di2015NewLine                TryDi2015NewLine                    reader = New StreamReader(ResponseStream, System.Text.Encoding.GetEncoding(CharSet), True, 256)Di2015NewLine                Catch ex As ExceptionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    'Di2015NewLine                    ' Redo the streamDi2015NewLine                    'Di2015NewLine                    If InStr(ex.Message, "not a supported encoding name.") > 0 ThenDi2015NewLine                        TryDi2015NewLine                            reader = New StreamReader(ResponseStream, System.Text.Encoding.GetEncoding("utf-8"), True, 256)Di2015NewLine                        Catch ex1 As ExceptionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        End TryDi2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLine                End TryDi2015NewLine                'Di2015NewLine                'Dim string to build index.Di2015NewLine                'Di2015NewLine                Dim IndexBuildString As New StringBuilder()Di2015NewLine                TryDi2015NewLine                    Dim read(256) As [Char]Di2015NewLine                    'Di2015NewLine                    ' Reads 256 characters at a time.    Di2015NewLine                    'Di2015NewLine                    Dim ByteCount As Integer = reader.Read(read, 0, 256)Di2015NewLine                    'Di2015NewLine                    ' Read in 'Check if limit of kilobytes are over the limit.Di2015NewLine                        'Di2015NewLine                        If                    'Di2015NewLine                        'Dumps the 256 characters to a string and displays the string to the console.Di2015NewLine                        'Di2015NewLine                        Dim str As New [String](read, 0, ByteCount)Di2015NewLine                        ByteCount = reader.Read(read, 0, 256)Di2015NewLine                        'Di2015NewLine 13992747Di2015UniqueSeparatorCastExtensions

13992747Di2015UniqueSeparator[Flags]Di2015NewLinepublic enum CastOptionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    None = 0,Di2015NewLine    ExcludeNulls = 1,Di2015NewLine    UseConversions = 2Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13992747Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<object> OfType(this List<object> list, Di2015NewLine                                         string typeName, CastOptions options)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type type = Type.GetType(typeName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var obj in list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Object.ReferenceEquals(obj, null))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (options.HasFlag(CastOptions.ExcludeNulls))Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            yield return obj;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var objectType = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Derived type?Di2015NewLine        if (type.IsAssignableFrom(objectType))Di2015NewLine            yield return obj;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Should we try to convert?Di2015NewLine        if (!options.HasFlag(CastOptions.UseConversions))Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Castable?Di2015NewLine        object convertedValue = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var method = typeof(CastExtensions)Di2015NewLine                .GetMethod("Cast", BindingFlags.Static|BindingFlags.NonPublic)Di2015NewLine                .MakeGenericMethod(type);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            convertedValue = method.Invoke(null, new object[] { obj });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (InvalidCastException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // No implicit/explicit conversion operatorsDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (convertedValue != null)Di2015NewLine            yield return convertedValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convertible?Di2015NewLine        if (options.HasFlag(CastOptions.UseConversions))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IConvertible convertible = obj as IConvertible;Di2015NewLine                if (convertible != null)Di2015NewLine                    convertible.ToType(type, CultureInfo.CurrentCulture);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Exact exception depends on the source object typeDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13992747Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static T Cast<T>(object obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (T)obj;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13993552Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask
13993552Di2015UniqueSeparatorAsyncCountdownEvent
13993552Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.Hosting;Di2015NewLineusing Nito.AsyncEx;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// A type that tracks background operations and notifies ASP.NET that they are still in progress.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic sealed class BackgroundTaskManager : IRegisteredObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A cancellation token that is set when ASP.NET is shutting down the app domain.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private readonly CancellationTokenSource shutdown;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A countdown event that is incremented each time a task is registered and decremented each time it completes. When it reaches zero, we are ready to shut down the app domain. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private readonly AsyncCountdownEvent count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A task that completes after <see cref="count"/> reaches zero and the object has been unregistered.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private readonly Task done;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private BackgroundTaskManager()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Start the count at 1 and decrement it when ASP.NET notifies us we're shutting down.Di2015NewLine        shutdown = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine        count = new AsyncCountdownEvent(1);Di2015NewLine        shutdown.Token.Register(() => count.Signal(), useSynchronizationContext: false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Register the object and unregister it when the count reaches zero.Di2015NewLine        HostingEnvironment.RegisterObject(this);Di2015NewLine        done = count.WaitAsync().ContinueWith(_ => HostingEnvironment.UnregisterObject(this), TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void IRegisteredObject.Stop(bool immediate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        shutdown.Cancel();Di2015NewLine        if (immediate)Di2015NewLine            done.Wait();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Registers a task with the ASP.NET runtime.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="task">The task to register.</param>Di2015NewLine    private void Register(Task task)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        count.AddCount();Di2015NewLine        task.ContinueWith(_ => count.Signal(), TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The background task manager for this app domain.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private static readonly BackgroundTaskManager instance = new BackgroundTaskManager();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets a cancellation token that is set when ASP.NET is shutting down the app domain.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static CancellationToken Shutdown { get { return instance.shutdown.Token; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Executes an <c>async</c> background operation, registering it with ASP.NET.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="operation">The background operation.</param>Di2015NewLine    public static void Run(Func<Task> operation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        instance.Register(Task.Run(operation));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Executes a background operation, registering it with ASP.NET.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="operation">The background operation.</param>Di2015NewLine    public static void Run(Action operation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        instance.Register(Task.Run(operation));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13993651Di2015UniqueSeparatorIntPtr ptr = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLineint dunno = 99;Di2015NewLinestring result = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint retval = func1(42, out ptr, ref dunno);Di2015NewLineif (retval == success) {Di2015NewLine    result = Marshal.PtrToStringAnsi(ptr);Di2015NewLine    // etc...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (ptr != IntPtr.Zero) func1free(ptr);Di2015NewLine
13993652Di2015UniqueSeparator        private List<string> sqlInstances = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        private void collectInstances()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Data.Sql.SqlDataSourceEnumerator instance = System.Data.Sql.SqlDataSourceEnumerator.Instance;Di2015NewLine                System.Data.DataTable dataTable = instance.GetDataSources();Di2015NewLine                foreach (DataRow row in dataTable.Rows)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string instanceName = String.Format(@"{0}\\{1}", row["ServerName"].ToString(), row["InstanceName"].ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Do not add the local instance, we will add it in the next section. Otherwise, duplicated!Di2015NewLine                    if (!sqlInstances.Contains(instanceName) && !instanceName.Contains(Environment.MachineName))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        sqlInstances.Add(instanceName);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                /*Di2015NewLine                 * For some reason, GetDataSources() does not get local instances. So using code from here to get themDi2015NewLine                 * http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6824188/sqldatasourceenumerator-instance-getdatasources-does-not-locate-local-sql-servDi2015NewLine                 */Di2015NewLine                List<string> lclInstances = GetLocalSqlServerInstanceNames();Di2015NewLine                foreach (var lclInstance in lclInstances)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string instanceName = String.Format(@"{0}\\{1}", Environment.MachineName, lclInstance);Di2015NewLine                    if (!sqlInstances.Contains(instanceName)) sqlInstances.Add(instanceName);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                sqlInstances.Sort();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Got code from: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6824188/sqldatasourceenumerator-instance-getdatasources-does-not-locate-local-sql-servDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///  get local sql server instance names from registry, search both WOW64 and WOW3264 hivesDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>a list of local sql server instance names</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static List<string> GetLocalSqlServerInstanceNames()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RegistryValueDataReader registryValueDataReader = new 13997222Di2015UniqueSeparator    public double GetFValue(Image image)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Bitmap source = new Bitmap(image);Di2015NewLine        int count = 0;Di2015NewLine        double total = 0;Di2015NewLine        double totalVariance = 0;Di2015NewLine        double FM = 0;Di2015NewLine        Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(source.Width, source.Height);Di2015NewLine        Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(0, 0, source.Width, source.Height);Di2015NewLine        //Bitmap targetRect = new Bitmap(rect.Width, rect.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //newDi2015NewLine        ///*Di2015NewLine        BitmapData bmd = source.LockBits(rect, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, source.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine        int[] pixelData = new int[(rect.Height * rect.Width) -1];Di2015NewLine        System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(bmd.Scan0, pixelData, 0, pixelData.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < pixelData.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            count++;Di2015NewLine            Color c = Color.FromArgb(pixelData[i]);Di2015NewLine            int luma = (int)(c.R * 0.3 + c.G * 0.59 + c.B * 0.11);Di2015NewLine            //Probably a formula for thisDi2015NewLine            pixelData[i] = Color.FromArgb(luma, luma, luma).ToArgb(); Di2015NewLine            total += luma;Di2015NewLine            double avg = total / count;Di2015NewLine            totalVariance += Math.Pow(luma - avg, 2);Di2015NewLine            double stDV = Math.Sqrt(totalVariance / count);Di2015NewLine            FM = Math.Round(stDV, 2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        source.UnlockBits(bmd);Di2015NewLine        return FM;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine

14000551Di2015UniqueSeparator    private bool ValidateFacebookCredentials(string email, string password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CookieContainer cookies = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest request = null;Di2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse response = null;Di2015NewLine        string returnData = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Need to retrieve cookies firstDi2015NewLine        request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(new Uri("https://www.facebook.com/login.php?login_attempt=1"));Di2015NewLine        request.Method = "GET";Di2015NewLine        request.CookieContainer = cookies;Di2015NewLine        response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Set up the requestDi2015NewLine        request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(new Uri("https://www.facebook.com/login.php?login_attempt=1"));Di2015NewLine        request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine        request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine        request.UserAgent = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13";Di2015NewLine        request.Referer = "https://www.facebook.com/login.php?login_attempt=1";Di2015NewLine        request.AllowAutoRedirect = true;Di2015NewLine        request.KeepAlive = true;Di2015NewLine        request.CookieContainer = cookies;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Format the POST dataDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder postData = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        postData.Append("lsd=AVqRGVie&display=");Di2015NewLine        postData.Append("&legacy_return=1");Di2015NewLine        postData.Append("&return_session=0");Di2015NewLine        postData.Append("&trynum=1");Di2015NewLine        postData.Append("&charset_test=%E2%82%AC%2C%C2%B4%2C%E2%82%AC%2C%C2%B4%2C%E6%B0%B4%2C%D0%94%2C%D0%84");Di2015NewLine        postData.Append("&timezone=0");Di2015NewLine        postData.Append("&lgnrnd=153743_eO6D");Di2015NewLine        postData.Append("&lgnjs=1355614667");Di2015NewLine        postData.Append(String.Format("&email={0}", email));Di2015NewLine        postData.Append(String.Format("&pass={0}", password));Di2015NewLine        postData.Append("&default_persistent=0");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //write the POST data to the streamDi2015NewLine        using(StreamWriter writer = new StreamWriter(request.GetRequestStream()))Di2015NewLine            writer.Write(postData.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Read the web page (HTML) that we retrieve after sending the requestDi2015NewLine        using (StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream()))Di2015NewLine            returnData = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return !returnData.Contains("Please re-enter your password");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14001586Di2015UniqueSeparatorunsafe public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(sizeof(IMAGE_DOS_HEADER)); //64Di2015NewLine    Console.Read();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic struct IMAGE_DOS_HEADERDi2015NewLine{      // DOS .EXE headerDi2015NewLine    [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.ByValArray, SizeConst = 2)]Di2015NewLine    public UInt16 e_magic;              // Magic numberDi2015NewLine    public UInt16 e_cblp;               // Bytes on last page of fileDi2015NewLine    public UInt16 e_cp;                 // Pages in fileDi2015NewLine    public UInt16 e_crlc;               // RelocationsDi2015NewLine    public UInt16 e_cparhdr;            // Size of header in paragraphsDi2015NewLine    public UInt16 e_minalloc;           // Minimum extra paragraphs neededDi2015NewLine    public UInt16 e_maxalloc;           // Maximum extra paragraphs neededDi2015NewLine    public UInt16 e_ss;                 // Initial (relative) SS valueDi2015NewLine    public UInt16 e_sp;                 // Initial SP valueDi2015NewLine    public UInt16 e_csum;               // ChecksumDi2015NewLine    public UInt16 e_ip;                 // Initial IP valueDi2015NewLine    public UInt16 e_cs;                 // Initial (relative) CS valueDi2015NewLine    public UInt16 e_lfarlc;
