14004882Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IPackableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public float Weight { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IPackerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Returns a list of packages represented by lists of fruits.Di2015NewLine    List<List<Fruit>> GetPackages(IEnumerable<Fruit> fruits, float maxPackageWeight);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Packer : IPackerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public List<List<Fruit>> GetPackages(IEnumerable<Fruit> fruits,Di2015NewLine                                         float maxPackageWeight)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var currentPackage = new List<Fruit>();Di2015NewLine        var packages = new List<List<Fruit>>(currentPackage);Di2015NewLine        float currentWeight = 0.0f;Di2015NewLine        foreach (Fruit fruit in fruits) {Di2015NewLine            var packable = fruit as IPackable;Di2015NewLine            if (packable != null && packable.Weight <= maxPackageWeight) {Di2015NewLine                if (currentWeight + packable.Weight <= maxPackageWeight) {Di2015NewLine                    currentPackage.Add(fruit);Di2015NewLine                    currentWeight += packable.Weight;Di2015NewLine                } else {Di2015NewLine                    var currentPackage = new List<Fruit>(fruit);Di2015NewLine                    packages.Add(currentPackage);Di2015NewLine                    currentWeight = packable.Weight;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return packages;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14006527Di2015UniqueSeparator//Load the texture from the content pipelineDi2015NewLineTexture2D texture = Content.Load<Texture2D>("Your Texture Name and Directory");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Convert the 1D array, to a 2D array for accessing data easily (Much easier to do Colors[x,y] than Colors[i],because it specifies an easy to read pixel)Di2015NewLineColor[,] Colors = TextureTo2DArray(texture);Di2015NewLine
14006527Di2015UniqueSeparator Color[,] TextureTo2DArray(Texture2D texture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Color[] colors1D = new Color[texture.Width * texture.Height]; //The hard to read,1D arrayDi2015NewLine        texture.GetData(colors1D); //Get the colors and add them to the arrayDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Color[,] colors2D = new Color[texture.Width, texture.Height]; //The new, easy to read 2D arrayDi2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < texture.Width; x++) //Convert!Di2015NewLine            for (int y = 0; y < texture.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine                colors2D[x, y] = colors1D[x + y * texture.Width];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return colors2D; //Done!Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14006716Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static string GetElementPath(XElement element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parent = element.Parent;Di2015NewLine        if(parent == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return element.Name.LocalName;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return GetElementPath(parent) + "->" + element.Name.LocalName;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var xml = @"Di2015NewLine            <Foo>Di2015NewLine                <Bar>3</Bar>Di2015NewLine                <Foo>Di2015NewLine                    <Bar>10</Bar>Di2015NewLine                </Foo>Di2015NewLine            </Foo>";Di2015NewLine        var xdoc = XDocument.Parse(xml);Di2015NewLine        var dictionary = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine        foreach(var element in xdoc.Descendants())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(!element.HasElements)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var key = GetElementPath(element);Di2015NewLine                dictionary[key] = (string)element;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(dictionary["Foo->Bar"]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14007103Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpressionVisitor
14007103Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<T,bool>
14007103Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TypeConversionVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<Expression, Expression> parameterMap;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TypeConversionVisitor(Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<Expression, Expression> parameterMap)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.parameterMap = parameterMap;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // re-map the parameterDi2015NewLine        Expression found;Di2015NewLine        if(!parameterMap.TryGetValue(node, out found))Di2015NewLine            found = base.VisitParameter(node);Di2015NewLine        return found;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitMember(MemberExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // re-perform any member-bindingDi2015NewLine        var expr = Visit(node.Expression);Di2015NewLine        if (expr.Type != node.Type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MemberInfo newMember = expr.Type.GetMember(node.Member.Name)Di2015NewLine                                       .Single();Di2015NewLine            return Expression.MakeMemberAccess(expr, newMember);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return base.VisitMember(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14007103Di2015UniqueSeparatorVisitParameter
14007103Di2015UniqueSeparatorVisitMember
14007103Di2015UniqueSeparatorVisit
14007103Di2015UniqueSeparatorParameterExpression
14007103Di2015UniqueSeparatorMemberExpression
14007103Di2015UniqueSeparator// allows extension to other signatures later...Di2015NewLineprivate static Expression<TTo> ConvertImpl<TFrom, TTo>(Expression<TFrom> from)Di2015NewLine    where TFrom : classDi2015NewLine    where TTo : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // figure out which types are different in the function-signatureDi2015NewLine    var fromTypes = from.Type.GetGenericArguments();Di2015NewLine    var toTypes = typeof(TTo).GetGenericArguments();Di2015NewLine    if (fromTypes.Length != toTypes.Length)Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException(Di2015NewLine            "Incompatible lambda function-type signatures");Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<Type, Type> typeMap = new Dictionary<Type,Type>();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < fromTypes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (fromTypes[i] != toTypes[i])Di2015NewLine            typeMap[fromTypes[i]] = toTypes[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // re-map all parameters that involve different typesDi2015NewLine    Dictionary<Expression, Expression> parameterMapDi2015NewLine        = new Dictionary<Expression, Expression>();Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression[] newParams =Di2015NewLine        new ParameterExpression[from.Parameters.Count];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < newParams.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type newType;Di2015NewLine        if(typeMap.TryGetValue(from.Parameters[i].Type, out newType))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parameterMap[from.Parameters[i]] = newParams[i] =Di2015NewLine                Expression.Parameter(newType, from.Parameters[i].Name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            newParams[i] = from.Parameters[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // rebuild the lambdaDi2015NewLine    var body = new TypeConversionVisitor(parameterMap).Visit(from.Body);Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<TTo>(body, newParams);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14007103Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression<TFrom>
14007103Di2015UniqueSeparatorTTo
14007103Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression<TTo>
14007103Di2015UniqueSeparatorTFrom
14007103Di2015UniqueSeparatorTTo
14007103Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class Helpers {Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<TTo, bool>> Convert<TFrom, TTo>(Di2015NewLine        this Expression<Func<TFrom, bool>> from)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ConvertImpl<Func<TFrom, bool>, Func<TTo, bool>>(from);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // insert from above: ConvertImplDi2015NewLine    // insert from above: TypeConversionVisitorDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

ParameterizedThreadStart pts = new ParameterizedThreadStart(ProcessFile);Di2015NewLine            Thread th = new Thread(pts);Di2015NewLine            th.Start(file);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //wait for all threads to complete...Di2015NewLine        while (processedCounter< checkCount)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Work completed!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void ProcessFile(object file)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(DateTime.Now.ToString() + " recieved: " + file + " thread count is: " + workingCounter.ToString());Di2015NewLine            //make some sleep for demo...Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(2000);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //handle your exception...Di2015NewLine            string exMsg = ex.Message;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Interlocked.Decrement(ref workingCounter);Di2015NewLine            Interlocked.Increment(ref processedCounter);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14016989Di2015UniqueSeparatorApproximateFloatComparer
14016989Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ApproximateFloatComparer : IComparer<float>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public float Range { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ApproximateFloatComparer(float range)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Range = range;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(float x, float y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x - this.Range < y && x + this.Range > y)Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        else return x.CompareTo(y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14016989Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<float> Deduplicate(List<float> floats, float range)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var dedup = new List<float>();Di2015NewLine    var comparer = new ApproximateFloatComparer(range);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var @float in floats)Di2015NewLine        if (!dedup.Any(f => comparer.Compare(f, @float) == 0))Di2015NewLine            dedup.Add(@float);Di2015NewLine    return dedup;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14020178Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class ExportAccountsResult : ActionResultDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected ExportAccountsResult(IEnumerable<Account> accounts, ExportViewModel exportOptions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Accounts = accounts;Di2015NewLine        this.ExportOptions = exportOptions;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected IEnumerable<Account> Accounts { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    protected ExportViewModel ExportOptions { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected abstract string ContentType { get; }Di2015NewLine    protected abstract string Filename { get; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void ExecuteResult(ControllerContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var response = context.HttpContext.Response;Di2015NewLine        response.ContentType = ContentType;Di2015NewLine        var cd = new ContentDispositionDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FileName = this.Filename,Di2015NewLine            Inline = falseDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        response.AddHeader("Content-Disposition", cd.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // TODO: Use a real CSV parser here such as https://github.com/JoshClose/CsvHelper/wiki/BasicsDi2015NewLine        // and never roll your own parser as shown in this oversimplifiedDi2015NewLine        // example. Here's why: http://secretgeek.net/csv_trouble.aspDi2015NewLine        using (var writer = new StreamWriter(response.OutputStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var account in this.Accounts)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var values = new List<object>();Di2015NewLine                if (this.ExportOptions.IncludeName)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    values.Add(account.Name);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (this.ExportOptions.IncludeDescription)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    values.Add(account.Description);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (this.ExportOptions.IncludeAddress)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    values.Add(account.Address);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine(string.Join(", ", values));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14022489Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool skipEvents = false; // this flag to avoid infinite recursionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid treeView1_BeforeCheck(object sender, TreeViewCancelEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // if is a root (car or shoes), or it's a recursive call, just returnDi2015NewLine    if (skipEvents || e.Node.Parent == null) Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    skipEvents = true;Di2015NewLine    foreach (TreeNode sibling in e.Node.Parent.Nodes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // set the other siblings to uncheckedDi2015NewLine        if (sibling != e.Node)Di2015NewLine            sibling.Checked = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    skipEvents = false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14022489Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string GetSelectionString()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string categorySep = Environment.NewLine;Di2015NewLine    string parentChildSep = " : ";Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (TreeNode root in this.treeView1.Nodes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (TreeNode node in root.Nodes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (node.Checked)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (sb.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                    sb.Append(categorySep);Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(root.Text);Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(parentChildSep);Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(node.Text);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14022489Di2015UniqueSeparatorCar : FerrariDi2015NewLineShoes : PumaDi2015NewLine
14022489Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool skipEvents = false; // this flag to avoid infinite recursionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid treeView1_BeforeCheck(object sender, TreeViewCancelEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // if it's a recursive call, just returnDi2015NewLine    if (skipEvents)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    skipEvents = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // it's a root (e.g. car or shoes) Di2015NewLine    if (e.Node.Parent == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // if root node is going to be checked, just cancel the action (i.e. block parent selection)Di2015NewLine        if (!e.Node.Checked)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            e.Cancel = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (TreeNode sibling in e.Node.Parent.Nodes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // set the other siblings to uncheckedDi2015NewLine            if (sibling != e.Node)Di2015NewLine                sibling.Checked = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    skipEvents = false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid treeView1_AfterCheck(object sender, TreeViewEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // if it's a recursive call, just returnDi2015NewLine    if (skipEvents)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this.skipEvents = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // it's a root (e.g. car or shoes) Di2015NewLine    if (e.Node.Parent == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // root node has been unchecked, so uncheck the childrenDi2015NewLine        if (!e.Node.Checked)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (TreeNode child in e.Node.Nodes)Di2015NewLine                child.Checked = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // if a child node has been checked --> check the parentDi2015NewLine        // otherwise, uncheck the parentDi2015NewLine        e.Node.Parent.Checked = e.Node.Checked;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this.skipEvents = false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14022900Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void PrintPage(Object sender, PrintPageEventArgs ev)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (pageImage == null)Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            ev.Graphics.PageUnit = GraphicsUnit.Pixel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ev.Graphics.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLine            ev.Graphics.PixelOffsetMode = PixelOffsetMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine            float a = (ev.PageSettings.PrintableArea.Width / 100) * ev.Graphics.DpiX;Di2015NewLine            float b = ((ev.PageSettings.PrintableArea.Height / 100) * ev.Graphics.DpiY);Di2015NewLine            float scale = 1500;Di2015NewLine            scale = 0;Di2015NewLine            RectangleF srcRect = new RectangleF(0, startY, pageImage.Width, b - scale);Di2015NewLine            RectangleF destRect = new RectangleF(0, 0, a, b);Di2015NewLine            ev.Graphics.DrawImage(pageImage, destRect, srcRect, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine            startY = startY + b - scale;Di2015NewLine            float marignInPixel = (0.5f / 2.54f) * ev.Graphics.DpiY;Di2015NewLine            ev.HasMorePages = (startY + marignInPixel < pageImage.Height);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

14026489Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> FindVisualChildren<T>(DependencyObject depObj) where T : DependencyObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (depObj == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(depObj); i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var child = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(depObj, i);Di2015NewLine        if (child != null && child is T)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return (T)child;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var childOfChild in FindVisualChildren<T>(child))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return childOfChild;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14027249Di2015UniqueSeparator//collect two-pair itemsDi2015NewLinevar result = from KeyValuePair<int, Tuple<Quality, Item>> virtQ2I_1Di2015NewLine                    in QualitiesToItemsDi2015NewLine         join KeyValuePair<int, Tuple<Quality, Item>> virtQ2I_2Di2015NewLine                 in QualitiesToItemsDi2015NewLine         on virtQ2I_1.Value.Item1.name equals virtQ2I_2.Value.Item1.nameDi2015NewLine         where (virtQ2I_1.Value.Item2.name != virtQ2I_2.Value.Item2.name)Di2015NewLine         select new List<Item> {Di2015NewLine                    virtQ2I_1.Value.Item2, Di2015NewLine                    virtQ2I_2.Value.Item2Di2015NewLine                    };Di2015NewLineList<List<Item>> ItemsForSets = result.ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// self-join raw two-pair item list to generate three-set itemsDi2015NewLineresult =    from List<Item> leftSide in ItemsForSets Di2015NewLine        join List<Item> rightSide in ItemsForSetsDi2015NewLine        on leftSide[1] equals rightSide[0]Di2015NewLine        where (leftSide[0] != rightSide[1])Di2015NewLine        select new List<Item> {Di2015NewLine                    leftSide[0], Di2015NewLine                    leftSide[1],Di2015NewLine                    rightSide[1]Di2015NewLine                    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineItemsForSets.AddRange(result.ToList());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// clean up results - preventing A:B and B:A from being considered unique,Di2015NewLine//    and ensuring all third ingredients actually contribute to a relationship.Di2015NewLineforeach (List<Item> items in ItemsForSets)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<Quality> sharedQualities = Item.SharedQualities(this, items.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    sharedQualities.Sort();Di2015NewLine    List<String> sortedItems = items.ConvertAll(item => item.name); // I need the string names elsewhere Di2015NewLine    // TODO: I should rewrite to work directly with Items and convert after confirming I actually need the item.Di2015NewLine    sortedItems.Sort(); // first part of preventing A:B B:A problemsDi2015NewLine    if (!Sets.ContainsKey(String.Join(", ", sortedItems))) // Dictionary provides second part.Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (items.Count == 3)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<Quality> leftPairQualities = Item.SharedQualities(this, items.GetRange(0, 2).ToArray());Di2015NewLine            leftPairQualities.Sort();Di2015NewLine            if (leftPairQualities.SequenceEqual(sharedQualities))Di2015NewLine            { // if the third item does not add a new qualityDi2015NewLine                continue; // short circuit out to the next itemDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // otherwise add to the list.Di2015NewLine        Sets.Add(String.Join(", ", sortedItems), new Potion(items, sharedQualities));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14029091Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MathRichTextbox : RichTextBoxDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public MathRichTextbox()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.PreviewKeyDown += MathRichTextbox_PreviewKeyDown;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void MathRichTextbox_PreviewKeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Digit expr = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (e.Key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case Key.Left:Di2015NewLine                expr = findAdjacentMathDigits(LogicalDirection.Backward);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case Key.Right:Di2015NewLine                expr = findAdjacentMathDigits(LogicalDirection.Forward);                    Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (expr != null)Di2015NewLine            this.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(Di2015NewLine                new ThreadStart(() => expr.FocusBase()),Di2015NewLine                System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Input, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Digit findAdjacentMathDigits(LogicalDirection direction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Digit expr = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Selection.Text.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DependencyObject dpObj = CaretPosition.GetAdjacentElement(Di2015NewLine                direction);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // is it contained in BlockUIContainer?Di2015NewLine            expr = CaretPosition.GetAdjacentElement(Di2015NewLine                direction) as Digit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // is it onctained in a InlineUIContainer?Di2015NewLine            if (expr == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                InlineUIContainer uiWrapper =Di2015NewLine                    CaretPosition.GetAdjacentElement(Di2015NewLine                    direction) as InlineUIContainer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (uiWrapper != null)Di2015NewLine                    expr = uiWrapper.Child as Digit;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return expr;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

   {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var count = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(targetElement);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine text.Substring(index + lenth), FontWeight = FontWeights.Normal });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                textBlock1.FontSize = 30;Di2015NewLine                textBlock1.Foreground = new IDi2015NewLine                                              // am only interested in 2009 grants.Di2015NewLine                                              if (this.FY2009 !== undefined && this.FY2009 !== null) {Di2015NewLine                                                emit(this.country_name, {Di2015NewLine                                                  dollars: this.FY2009,Di2015NewLine                                                  life_expectancy: 0Di2015NewLine                                                });Di2015NewLine                                              }Di2015NewLine                                            }";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string r = @"function(key, values) {Di2015NewLine                                            var result = {dollars: 0, life_expectancy: 0};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                            values.forEach(function(value) {Di2015NewLine                                                // Sum up all the money from all the 2009 grants for thisDi2015NewLine                                                // country (key)Di2015NewLine                                                result.dollars += (value.dollars !== null) ? value.dollars : 0;Di2015NewLine                                                // Only set life expectancy onceDi2015NewLine                                                if (result.life_expectancy === 0 &&Di2015NewLine                                                    value.life_expectancy !== nullDi2015NewLine                                                ) {Di2015NewLine                                                    result.life_expectancy = value.life_expectancy;Di2015NewLine                                                }Di2015NewLine                                            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                            return result;Di2015NewLine                                        }";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14033270Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string randomBit()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int bitSize = 0, input = 0;Di2015NewLine    Console.Write("Input Bit Size (Maximum is 16 Bit): ");Di2015NewLine    input = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine    Random choice = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (input <= 0 || input > 16)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bitSize = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if(input == 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bitSize = 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {                        Di2015NewLine        int randomChoice = choice.Next(1 << (input-1), (1 << input)-1);Di2015NewLine        bitSize = randomChoice;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string binary = Convert.ToString(bitSize, 2);Di2015NewLine    return binary;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14035115Di2015UniqueSeparatorsql = "SELECT Grupi_ID, (p.emri + ' ' + p.mbiemri) as Profesori , k.EmriKlases as Klasa,  d.emri as Dita, Ora_fillimit as Fillimi, Ora_mbarimit as Mbarimi ";Di2015NewLinesql += "FROM grupetOraret gro ";Di2015NewLinesql += "inner join Profesori p on gro.Profesori_ID=p.Profesor_ID ";Di2015NewLinesql += "inner join Klasa k on gro.Klasa_ID=k.Klasa_ID ";Di2015NewLinesql += "inner join Dita d on gro.ID_Dita=d.ID_dita ";Di2015NewLine
14035199Di2015UniqueSeparatordouble[] input = double[5]; //Pretend the user has entered theseDi2015NewLineint[] counters = int[input.Length]; //One for each "dimension"Di2015NewLineList<double> sums = new List<double>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < counters.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine   counters[i] = -1; //The -1 value allows the process to begin with sum of single digits, then pairs, etc..Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile (true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double thisSum = 0;Di2015NewLine    //Apply countersDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < counters.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (counters[i] == -1) continue; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        thisSum += input[counters[i]];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Increment countersDi2015NewLine    counters[0]++; //Increment at baseDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < counters.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (counters[i] >= counters.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i == counters.Length - 1) //Check if this is the last dimensionDi2015NewLine               return sums; //Exhausted all possible combinationsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            counters[i] = 0;Di2015NewLine            counters[i+1]++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine           break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14035369Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetActionDelegate()
14035369Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CreateDelegateTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Func<TResult> GetFunctionDelegate<TResult>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var methodInfo = typeof(CreateDelegateTest).GetMethod("FunctionMethod")Di2015NewLine                                                   .MakeGenericMethod(typeof(TResult));Di2015NewLine        return (Func<TResult>)Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<TResult>), methodInfo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Action<T> GetActionDelegate<T>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var methodInfo = typeof(CreateDelegateTest).GetMethod("ActionMethod")Di2015NewLine                                                   .MakeGenericMethod(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        return (Action<T>)Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<T>), methodInfo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14035369Di2015UniqueSeparatorCreateDelegate(Type, Type, string)
14035369Di2015UniqueSeparatorMakeGenericMethod()
14035369Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Delegate CreateDelegate(Type delegateType, Type objectType, string methodName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var delegateMethod      = delegateType.GetMethod("Invoke");Di2015NewLine    var delegateReturn      = delegateMethod.ReturnType;Di2015NewLine    var delegateParameters  = delegateMethod.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine    var methods             = objectType.GetMethods();Di2015NewLine    MethodInfo method = null;Di2015NewLine    ParameterInfo[] methodParameters = null;Di2015NewLine    Type methodReturn = null;Di2015NewLine    // find correct method by argument countDi2015NewLine    foreach(var methodInfo in methods)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(methodInfo.Name != methodName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        methodParameters = methodInfo.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine        methodReturn = methodInfo.ReturnType;Di2015NewLine        if(methodParameters.Length != delegateParameters.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        method = methodInfo;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if(method == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Method not found");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if(method.IsGenericMethodDefinition)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var genericArguments    = method.GetGenericArguments();Di2015NewLine        var genericParameters   = new Type[genericArguments.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int genericArgumentIndex = Array.IndexOf(genericArguments, methodReturn);Di2015NewLine        if(genericArgumentIndex != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            genericParameters[genericArgumentIndex] = delegateReturn;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int i = 0; i < methodParameters.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var methodParameter = methodParameters[i];Di2015NewLine            genericArgumentIndex = Array.IndexOf(genericArguments, methodParameter.ParameterType);Di2015NewLine            if(genericArgumentIndex == -1) continue;Di2015NewLine            genericParameters[genericArgumentIndex] = delegateParameters[i].ParameterType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(Array.IndexOf(genericParameters, null) != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Failed to resolve some generic parameters.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var concreteMethod = method.MakeGenericMethod(genericParameters);Di2015NewLine        return Delegate.CreateDelegate(delegateType, concreteMethod);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Delegate.CreateDelegate(delegateType, method);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14042205Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void SetMouse(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float xpos = 2.0f * ((float)x / (float)_width) - 1.0f;Di2015NewLine    float ypos = 2.0f* (1.0f - (float)y / (float)_height) - 1.0f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Vector4 startRay = new Vector4(xpos, ypos, -1, 1);Di2015NewLine    Vector4 endRay = new Vector4(xpos, ypos, 1, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Matrix4 trans = _modelView.Data * _projection.Data;Di2015NewLine    trans.Invert();Di2015NewLine    startRay = Vector4.Transform(startRay, trans);Di2015NewLine    endRay = Vector4.Transform(endRay, trans);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    _pickFrom = startRay.Xyz / startRay.W;Di2015NewLine    _pickTo = endRay.Xyz / endRay.W;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14046137Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<U> Except<R, S, T, U>(this IEnumerable<R> mainList, Di2015NewLine                                                IEnumerable<S> toBeSubtractedList,Di2015NewLine                                                Func<R, T> mainListFunction, Di2015NewLine                                                Func<S, T> toBeSubtractedListFunction,Di2015NewLine                                                Func<R, U> resultSelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return EnumerateToCheck(mainList, toBeSubtractedList, mainListFunction, Di2015NewLine                            toBeSubtractedListFunction, resultSelector, false);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic IEnumerable<U> EnumerateToCheck<R, S, T, U>(IEnumerable<R> mainList, Di2015NewLine                                                   IEnumerable<S> secondaryList,Di2015NewLine                                                   Func<R, T> mainListFunction, Di2015NewLine                                                   Func<S, T> secondaryListFunction,Di2015NewLine                                                   Func<R, U> resultSelector,Di2015NewLine                                                   bool ifFound)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var r in mainList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool found = false;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var s in secondaryList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (object.Equals(mainListFunction(r), secondaryListFunction(s)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                found = true;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (found == ifFound)Di2015NewLine            yield return resultSelector(r);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //or may be justDi2015NewLine    //return mainList.Where(r => secondaryList.Any(s => object.Equals(mainListFunction(r), secondaryListFunction(s))) == ifFound)Di2015NewLine    //               .Select(r => resultSelector(r));Di2015NewLine    //but I like the verbose way.. easier to debug..Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<U> Intersect<R, S, T, U>(this IEnumerable<R> mainList, Di2015NewLine mainListFunction, Di2015NewLine                            toIntersectListFunction, resultSelector, true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14046763Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SpeedCalculatorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const int samples = 5;Di2015NewLine    private const int sampleRate = 1000; //In millisecondsDi2015NewLine    private int bytesDownloadedSinceLastQuery;Di2015NewLine    private System.Threading.Timer queryTimer;Di2015NewLine    private Queue<int> byteDeltas = new Queue<int>(samples);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private FTPDownloadFile downloader; // CHANGEDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SpeedCalculator(FTPDownloadFile fileDownloader) // CHANGEDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        downloader = fileDownloader;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void StartPolling()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        queryTimer = new System.Threading.Timer(this.QueryByteDelta, null, 0, sampleRate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void QueryByteDelta(object data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (byteDeltas.Count == samples)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byteDeltas.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byteDeltas.Enqueue(_bytesDownloaded - bytesDownloadedSinceLastQuery);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bytesDownloadedSinceLastQuery = downloader.bytesDownloaded; // CHANGEDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//and in the other fileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic FTPDownloadFile()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bytesDownloaded = 0;Di2015NewLine    Speed = new SpeedCalculator( this ); // CHANGEDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14046880Di2015UniqueSeparator public static DataTable ReadMsiPropertyTable(string msiFile, string tableName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataTable dataTable = new DataTable(tableName);Di2015NewLine            Type installerType = Type.GetTypeFromProgID("WindowsInstaller.Installer");Di2015NewLine            Installer installer = (WindowsInstaller.Installer)Activator.CreateInstance(installerType);Di2015NewLine            Database database = installer.OpenDatabase(msiFile, MsiOpenDatabaseMode.msiOpenDatabaseModeReadOnly);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string sqlQuery = String.Format("SELECT * FROM {0}", tableName);Di2015NewLine            View view = database.OpenView(sqlQuery);Di2015NewLine            view.Execute(null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Record names = view.ColumnInfo[MsiColumnInfo.msiColumnInfoNames];Di2015NewLine            Record types = view.ColumnInfo[MsiColumnInfo.msiColumnInfoTypes];Di2015NewLine            Record row = view.Fetch();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int index = 1; index < names.FieldCount+1; index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string columnName = names.get_StringData(index);Di2015NewLine                string columnSpec = types.get_StringData(index);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                switch (columnSpec.Substring(0, 1).ToLower())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case "s":Di2015NewLine                        dataTable.Columns.Add(columnName, typeof(String));Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    case "l":Di2015NewLine                        dataTable.Columns.Add(columnName, typeof(String));Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    case "i":Di2015NewLine                        dataTable.Columns.Add(columnName, typeof(Int32));Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    case "v":Di2015NewLine                        dataTable.Columns.Add(columnName, typeof (Stream));Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (row != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DataRow dataRow = dataTable.NewRow();Di2015NewLine                for (int index = 0; index < dataTable.Columns.Count; index++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if(dataTable.Columns[index].DataType == typeof(String))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        dataRow[index] = row.StringData[index + 1];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if(dataTable.Columns[index].DataType == typeof(Int32))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        dataRow[index] = row.IntegerData[index + 1];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if(dataTable.Columns[index].DataType == typeof(Stream))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                       // Insanity has it's limits. Not implemented.Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                dataTable.Rows.Add(dataRow);Di2015NewLine                row = view.Fetch();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return dataTable;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

14047390Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[][] GetNonDuplicates(string[][] jagged)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  //not a hashset, but a dictionary. A value of false means that the row Di2015NewLine  //is not duplicate, a value of true means that at least one dulicate was foundDi2015NewLine  Dictionary<string[], bool> dict = Di2015NewLine          new Dictionary<string[], bool>(new RowEqualityComparer());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach(string[] row in jagged)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    //if a duplicate is found - using the hash and the compare methodDi2015NewLine    if (dict.ContainsKey(row)) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       dict[row] = true;  //set value to trueDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      dict.Add(row, false);  //first time we see this row, add itDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  //just pop out all the keys which have a value of falseDi2015NewLine  string[][] result = dict.Where(item => !item.Value)Di2015NewLine                          .Select(item => item.Key)Di2015NewLine                          .ToArray();Di2015NewLine  return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLinestring[][] jagged = new []{new []{"A","B"} , Di2015NewLine                           new []{"C","D","E"}, Di2015NewLine                           new []{"B", "A"},Di2015NewLine                           new []{"E","A"}};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring[][] nonDuplicates = GetNonDuplicates(jagged);Di2015NewLine
14047390Di2015UniqueSeparatorRowEqualityComparer
14047390Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass RowEqualityComparer : IEqualityComparer<string[]>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(string[] first, string[] second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // different legths - different rowsDi2015NewLine        if (first.Length != second.Length)Di2015NewLine          return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //we need to copy the arrays because Array.Sort Di2015NewLine        //will change the original rowsDi2015NewLine        var flist = first.ToList();Di2015NewLine        flist.Sort();Di2015NewLine        var slist = second.ToList();Di2015NewLine        slist.Sort();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //loop and compare one by oneDi2015NewLine        for (int i=0; i < flist.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (flist[i]!=slist[i])Di2015NewLine              return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(string[] row)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       //I have no idea what I'm doing, just some generic hash code calculationDi2015NewLine       if (row.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine         return 0;Di2015NewLine       int hash = row[0].GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine       for (int i = 1; i < row.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine         hash ^= row[i].GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine       return hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14049973Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate async void GeocodingWin8Query()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // build URL for Here.net REST serviceDi2015NewLine    string currentgeoLoc = "0.0,0.0";Di2015NewLine    string queryString = "Ferry Building, San-Francisco";Di2015NewLine    string appID = "<appId>"; // MAKE SURE TO GET YOUR OWN from developers.here.netDi2015NewLine    object appCode = "<appCode>"; // MAKE SURE TO GET YOUR OWN from developers.here.netDi2015NewLine    var hereNetUrl = string.Format(Di2015NewLine        "http://demo.places.nlp.nokia.com/places/v1/discover/search?at={0}&q={1}&app_id={2}&app_code={3}&accept=application/json",Di2015NewLine            currentgeoLoc, queryString, appID, appCode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get data from HERE.net REST APIDi2015NewLine    var httpClient = new HttpClient();Di2015NewLine    var hereNetResponse = await httpClient.GetStringAsync(hereNetUrl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // deseralize JSON from Here.net Di2015NewLine    using (var tr = new StringReader(hereNetResponse))Di2015NewLine    using (var jr = new JsonTextReader(tr))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rootObjectResponse = new JsonSerializer().Deserialize<RootObject>(jr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // print the details of the first geocoding result Di2015NewLine        var firstplace = rootObjectResponse.results.items.First();Di2015NewLine        await new MessageDialog("Name: " + firstplace.title + Environment.NewLine +Di2015NewLine                          "Geolocation: " + firstplace.position[0] + ", " + firstplace.position[1] + Environment.NewLine +Di2015NewLine                          "Address: " + HtmlUtilities.ConvertToText(firstplace.vicinity) + Environment.NewLine +Di2015NewLine                          "Type: " + firstplace.type + Environment.NewLine,Di2015NewLine                          "Win8 Nokia Maps Geocoding").ShowAsync();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14049995Di2015UniqueSeparatorlogger.Close()
14049995Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid IDisposable.Dispose()Di2015NewLine{   Di2015NewLine     Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Close() Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    _messages.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLine    _worker.Join(); // Wait for the consumer's thread to finish.Di2015NewLine    //Some logic on closing log fileDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14049995Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Work()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Try to get data from queueDi2015NewLine    LogMessage message;Di2015NewLine    while (_messages.TryTake(out message, Timeout.Infinite))Di2015NewLine       //... some simple logic to write 'message'       Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14049995Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Logger : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private BlockingCollection<LogMessage> _messages = null;Di2015NewLine    private Thread _worker = null;Di2015NewLine    private bool _started = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start() Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_started) return;Di2015NewLine        //Some logic to open log fileDi2015NewLine        OpenLogFile();      Di2015NewLine        _messages = new BlockingCollection<LogMessage>();  //int.MaxValue is the default upper-boundDi2015NewLine        _worker = new Thread(Work) { IsBackground = true };Di2015NewLine        _worker.Start();Di2015NewLine        _started = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Stop()Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        if (!_started) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // prohibit adding new messages to the queue, Di2015NewLine        // and cause TryTake to return false when the queue becomes empty.Di2015NewLine        _messages.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Wait for the consumer's thread to finish.Di2015NewLine        _worker.Join();  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Dispose managed resourcesDi2015NewLine        _worker.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        _messages.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Some logic to close log fileDi2015NewLine        CloseLogFile(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _started = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Implements IDiposable Di2015NewLine    /// In this case, it is simply an alias for Stop()Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    void IDisposable.Dispose() Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stop();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This is message consumer threadDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private void Work()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LogMessage message;Di2015NewLine        //Try to get data from queueDi2015NewLine        while(_messages.TryTake(out message, Timeout.Infinite))Di2015NewLine            WriteLogMessage(message); //... some simple logic to write 'message'Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14049995Di2015UniqueSeparatorStop()

14063264Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string CreateGRF(string filename, string imagename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Bitmap bmp = null;Di2015NewLine    BitmapData imgData = null;Di2015NewLine    byte[] pixels;Di2015NewLine    int x, y, width;Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb;Di2015NewLine    IntPtr ptr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bmp = new Bitmap(filename);Di2015NewLine        imgData = bmp.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format1bppIndexed);Di2015NewLine        width = (bmp.Width + 7) / 8;Di2015NewLine        pixels = new byte[width];Di2015NewLine        sb = new StringBuilder(width * bmp.Height * 2);Di2015NewLine        ptr = imgData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine        for (y = 0; y < bmp.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Marshal.Copy(ptr, pixels, 0, width);Di2015NewLine            for (x = 0; x < width; x++)Di2015NewLine                sb.AppendFormat("{0:X2}", (byte)~pixels[x]);Di2015NewLine            ptr = (IntPtr)(ptr.ToInt64() + imgData.Stride);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bmp != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (imgData != null) bmp.UnlockBits(imgData);Di2015NewLine            bmp.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return String.Format("~DG{0}.GRF,{1},{2},", imagename, width * y, width) + sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14063466Di2015UniqueSeparator[Register ("LimitedTextView")]Di2015NewLinepublic class LimitedTextView : UITextViewDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int MaxCharacters { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Initialize ()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MaxCharacters = 140;Di2015NewLine        ShouldChangeText = ShouldLimit;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static bool ShouldLimit (UITextView view, NSRange range, string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var textView = (LimitedTextView)view;Di2015NewLine        var limit = textView.MaxCharacters;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int newLength = (view.Text.Length - range.Length) + text.Length;Di2015NewLine        if (newLength <= limit)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This will clip pasted text to include as many characters as possibleDi2015NewLine        // See http://stackoverflow.com/a/5897912/458193Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var emptySpace = Math.Max (0, limit - (view.Text.Length - range.Length));Di2015NewLine        var beforeCaret = view.Text.Substring (0, range.Location) + text.Substring (0, emptySpace);Di2015NewLine        var afterCaret = view.Text.Substring (range.Location + range.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        view.Text = beforeCaret + afterCaret;Di2015NewLine        view.SelectedRange = new NSRange (beforeCaret.Length, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public LimitedTextView (IntPtr handle) : base (handle) { Initialize (); }Di2015NewLine    public LimitedTextView (RectangleF frame) : base (frame) { Initialize (); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14068790Di2015UniqueSeparatordef get_decimal(a, b):Di2015NewLine    result = str(a / b) + '.'Di2015NewLine    r = a % bDi2015NewLine    remainders = []Di2015NewLine    digits = []Di2015NewLine    while r not in remainders:Di2015NewLine        remainders.append(r)Di2015NewLine        digits.append(str(10 * r / b))Di2015NewLine        r = 10 * r % bDi2015NewLine    start = remainders.index(r)Di2015NewLine    result += ''.join(digits[0:start]) + '(' + ''.join(digits[start:]) + ')'Di2015NewLine    return resultDi2015NewLine

14076549Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class DirectorySizeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static long GetDirectorySize(DirectoryInfo dir)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long total = 0;Di2015NewLine        FileAttributes attributes = File.GetAttributes(dir.FullName);Di2015NewLine        if (!((attributes & FileAttributes.ReparsePoint) == FileAttributes.ReparsePoint))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            try{Di2015NewLine                FileInfo[] fileInfos = dir.GetFiles();Di2015NewLine                foreach (FileInfo fileInfo in fileInfos)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    total += fileInfo.Length;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                DirectoryInfo[] dirInfos = dir.GetDirectories();Di2015NewLine                foreach (DirectoryInfo dirInfo in dirInfos)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    total += DirectorySize.GetDirectorySize(dirInfo);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } catch (UnauthorizedAccessException)Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                // log this?Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return total;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
